RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH:
Possui Mestrado em Cincias Geolgicas pela Universidade Russa da Amizade dos Povos (UDN, 1996), com enfase em interpretao geofsica das trapas tipo clinoformas na busca de petrleo e gs. Possui Certificado de Cincias e Engenharia de Petrleo, na rea de concentrao em reservatrios e gesto. Possui graduao em Geologia de Petrleo e Gs pela Universidade Russa da Amizade dos Povos (UDN,1994), com enfase em geologia e explorao dos depsitos minerais de carbonatos salinizados com especializao na prospeco e na explorao dos mesmos encontrados na parte superior do perodo Devoniano no Campo de Crasnoselskaya. Possui graduao em Cincias Qumicas pelo Centro de Estudos Superiores do Carmo (CESUC,1984) com enfase em anlises industriais de fertilizantes, cidos sulfricos, fosfricos e clordricos, STPP, guas de caldeiras, negro de fumo e anlises especiais em cromatgrafos.
Scio da Empresa de Consultoria de petrleo e gs ?NEFTI & GAZA Oil Consulting? e responsvel pelas pesquisas de busca e explorao de leo de gnese inorgnica de gerao. Trabalhei no Municpio de Guaruj como Assessor Tcnico IV (Gelogo) da Proteo e Defesa Civil. L sou responsvel pela proteo e orientao dos Morros e cuido para que no ocorra desastres naturais causados pelas atuaes antrpicas. Ministrei aulas em Qumica e gnese do petrleo e gs, Geologia do petrleo, Qumica do petrleo. Geologia geral, Geologia Estrutural, Hidrogeologia entre outras. reas onde venho atuando hoje, Engenharia ambiental , Engenharia de petrleo e laudos geolgicos. Nessas reas especficas, ministrei as cadeiras de Geologia de rochas e solo, Geologia marinha e mecnica das rochas, como tambm oriento projetos aplicados no curso de Tecnologia de petrleo e projeto de trabalhos interdisciplinares nas reas de Engenharias. Os laudos sempre quando ocorre problemas ambientais e ou geolgicos.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: bachelor's at Geologia de Petrleo e Gs from Universidade Russa da Amizade dos Povos (1994), bachelor's at Cincias Qumicas from Centro de Estudos Superiores do Carmo (1984) and master's at Cincias Geologicas from Universidade Russa da Amizade dos Povos (1996). Has experience in Geosciences, focusing on Geosciences, acting on the following subjects: perfurao, petrleo, pacotes sedimentares resultantes, transgresso marinha and poo petrolfero.

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES: Professor tutor do projeto aplicado de Geologia Estrutural e Formao dos ocenos do segundo cilclo do curso tecnolgico de petrleo e gs da Universidade Unimonte. Os temas defendidos foram: CARACTERSTICAS E PACOTES SEDIMENTARES RESULTANTES DE REGRESSO MARINHA; SEDIMENTAO CONTINENTAL EM AMBIENTE DE RIFTES E PACOTES SEDIMENTARES RESULTANTES; CARACTERSTICA E PACOTES SEDIMENTARES RESULTANTES DE TRANSGRESSES MARINHAS;ORIGEM E EVOLUO DE RIFTES INTRA-CONTINENTAIS;FORMAO E CARACTERSTICA DE MARES DE CIRCULAO RESTRITA;AMBIENTES EVAPORTICOS TIPO SABKHA E SEQUNCIA DEPOSICIONAL CARACTERSTICA;AMBIENTES EVAPORTICOS DE PLAYA LAKES;BACIA TIPO SAG. A defesa dos temas foi aplicada na semana de 04/12/2008 com os professores da banca Maria Rita e Elisete Paes e Lima

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Trabalho como laboratorista II, exercendo as atividades de nalise de guas de caldeira, cidos slfurico, clordrico, fofrico, matria prima do sabo(STPP) e nalise de fertilizantes (NPK)
Trabalho de limpeza de guas superficiais, troca de solo e instalao de tanques ecolgicos.
Trabalho de controle de qualidade de materiais, de verificao dos equipamentos, de qualidade da obra e dos funcionrios, instalao de tanques de fibra de carbono, colocao de bombas de gasolina.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Mostra-se uma primeira tentativa de acumulao dos hidrocarbonetos de forma no bitica. Identifica-se um modelo para limites de placas.

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Acompanhava o processo de operao de carga e descarga de palets de acar. Operava o painel de controle de embarque e desembarque dos navios de acar. Organizava os turnos de trabalho e a entrada e sada dos caminhes de acar.
Trabalho com as vistorias de morros e preveno de acidentes relacionados com escorregamentos de massas, incndio, alagamentos e outros.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Executive summary This technical report is intended to elucidate the geological and geotechnical works rendered to perform the subdivision of work in Green Valley, located on Highway Padre Manoel da Nobrega, km 276. The surveyed area has the following geographic location coordinates with the parallel 23 54 '680' 'south latitude and the meridian 46 28' 389 '' west longitude of Greenwich Greenwich. The aim was to point and present the perceived risks of erosion of the soil, such as: - mass transit and gravitational mass movements in suggested lots, since the desired location can exist environmental obstacles susceptible to erosion, and if these are deleted and such are they, Forest, Agriculture / Field, Rivers and Streams risks may appear. It has been surveyed in total 37 lots covering an area of ​​approximately 23,553 square meters (m2) indicating the possible critical areas and areas suitable for the realization of the construction work. They identify appropriate and inappropriate places for construction. Inadequate prone to erosion and subject to mass movement. Cite are some recommendations for such processes may not occur or evolve. They point to some areas the flood, because it knows that occur rain precipitation above average in surveyed area in seasonal periods of the year. It is shown that 9785 Federal Law [1] 1999 allows such a procedure and variations for such an endeavor. According to the Urban Land Installment Law (Law No. 6,766 / 79) [12] the occupation of urban settlements and dismantling is entirely plausible that meet local legislation with slopes of up to 30%, ie between angularity 16, 7 - 26, 6. The report delivered to AB Consultancy and Engineering, Structural standpoint, identified the site as surveyed: - Coastal Province, located in the foothills Morro in Serra do Mar. INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Parecer de talude no Terrao
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Executive summary
This technical report is intended to show and point out the geological and geotechnical problems encountered on the slope land belonging to the Terrace Restaurant. The objective was to identify and present the perceived risks of erosion of soil caused by the infiltration of rainwater and accumulation of waste (manure) on the Slope of Avenida Alameda Ari Barroso, No 274, on the ground belonging to the Terrace Restaurant. It is shown that Complementary Law No. 271 [2] in Article 1, 2:07 paragraphs IV, I and section b aimed at the conservation of green area. The report delivered to the Structural Engineering and Architecture point of view, identified the site as surveyed: - Coastal Province, located in the foothills of the Morro da Serra in the sea zone. According to Sadowski author (1974) are present in this region cliffs festooned Morros and isolated. The site presented geomorphological characteristics hill top and slope segments predominantly straight with slope between 20 and 30. Usually these areas have about small ground, usually not more than 2.0 meters of soil. It was identified in the area an erosion process caused by the precipitation of seasonal rainwater and the flow of trash from the water (slurry) from the Terrace Restaurant right side of the slope. The soil is weathered and broken, requiring a structural intervention. The report indicates that make a retaludamento to contain assoreao and waterproofing of it. They were delivered together with the report of the Charter Geotechnical Morros Saint Vincent; ART / ART Billet; ART proof of payment
